en-US.min_comment: Minimum date that can be chosen by the user
en-US.max_comment: Maximum date that can be chosen by the user
en-US.localized_comment: Show the date localized in the output
en-US.relative_comment: Show the date relatively (eg 2 days ago)

en-US.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input
